# MCFC
Text formatting using Minecraft color codes.

## Installation
> Linux
> ```bash
>  python3.10 -m pip install mcfc
> ```
> Windows
> ```bash
>  pip install mcfc
> ```

## Usage
> ```python
> import mcfc
> 
> mcfc.f_print('&aHello World', '!')
> ```
> Output
> ![image](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/1004866892466495538/1027243927620833330/unknown.png)
